title: The Getty MART JSON Schema Documentation for the Activity Stream Feed
description: This document describes the structure and content of the Activity Stream feed provided by the Getty MART Linked Data system.

citation.title: The Getty MART JSON Schema Documentation for the Activity Stream Feed

resourceInfo.abstract: The J. Paul Getty Trust is sharing Linked Data representations of its collections data.

@context.title: The document's linked-data context, expressed as an absolute URL
@context.description: This field contains a URL referencing the Activity Streams linked-data context document.

summary.title: A summary string describing the content of the Activity Stream
summary.description: This field contains a human-readable summary of the content of the Activity Stream.

type.title: The Activity Stream document's type
type.description: This field contains the Activity Stream document's type. As MART exposes an Activity Stream in the form of an ordered collection of activity stream items, this will always be OrderedCollection.

id.title: The document's ID, expressed as an absolute URL
id.description: This field contains the document's own ID, expressed as an absolute URL.

startIndex.title: The start index of the Activity Stream pages. Always '1' in the case of MART.
startIndex.description: This field contains offset for the first page of the Activity Stream. MART uses page numbers starting at one (1), rather than zero (0).

totalItems.title: The current count of the items available from the Activity Stream.
totalItems.description: This field contains the current count of the items available from the Activity Stream. This number can change at any time as the system processes incoming data. It will never decrease, but could increase as new items are added to the end of the Activity Stream.

partOf.title: The list of items available from the current page of the Activity Stream.
partOf.description: This field contains the list of items available from the current page of the Activity Stream.

first.title: A reference to the first page of the Activity Stream.
first.description: This field contains a reference expressed as an absolute URL to the first page of items from the Activity Stream. This URL will always be static, referencing the page offset for the first page.

last.title: A reference to the last page of the Activity Stream.
last.description: This field contains a reference expressed as an absolute URL to the last page of items from the Activity Stream. This URL could change at any time as new items are added to the end of the Activity Stream, which may result in new pages being added to the paginated set to accomodate the new items.

previous.title: A reference to the previous page of the Activity Stream.
previous.description: This field contains a reference expressed as an absolute URL to the previous page of items within the Activity Stream, relative to the current page. All pages, except the first will have a reference to the previous page.

next.title: A reference to the next page of the Activity Stream.
next.description: This field contains a reference expressed as an absolute URL to the next page of items within the Activity Stream, relative to the current page. All pages, except the last will have a reference to the next page.

orderedItems.title: The list of ordered items available from the current page of the Activity Stream.
orderedItems.description: This field contains the list of ordered items available from the current page of the Activity Stream. The order of the items is always fixed, sorted from the first Activity Stream item being available as the first item within the first page of the Activity Stream, to the last item being available as the last item of the last page of the Activity Stream.

id.title: The Activity Stream item's ID, expressed as an absolute URL
id.description: This field contains the Activity Stream item's own ID, expressed as an absolute URL.

type.title: The type of change that occurred to the referenced document
type.description: This field contains the type of change that occurred to the referenced document

actor.title: The referenced document's actor ID
actor.description: This field contains the referenced document's actor. The actor in this case, if provided, is a reference to the person or actor that created, updated or deleted the referenced document.

id.title: The referenced document's actor ID, expressed as an absolute URL
id.description: This field contains the referenced document's actor ID, expressed as an absolute URL. The actor in this case is a reference to the person or actor that created, updated or deleted the referenced document.

type.title: The referenced document's actor type
type.description: This field contains the type of the referenced document's actor, expressed as a string

id.title: The referenced document's ID, expressed as an absolute URL
id.description: This field contains the referenced document's ID, expressed as an absolute URL.

type.title: The referenced document's type
type.description: This field contains the type of the referenced document, expressed as a string

created.title: The Activity Stream item's creation date
created.description: This field contains the creation date of the Activity Stream item, expressed as an RFC3339 formatted date, a subset of the ISO8601 date format.

updated.title: The Activity Stream item's updated (modification) date
updated.description: This field contains the updated (modification) date of the Activity Stream item, expressed as an RFC3339 formatted date, a subset of the ISO8601 date format.

published.title: The Activity Stream item's publication date
published.description: This field contains the publication date of the Activity Stream item, expressed as an RFC3339 formatted date, a subset of the ISO8601 date format.
